                   com.ihealth.communication.ins.InsCallback insCallback)
        A constructor for Bp5sContorl.
        Parameters:
        com - class for communication.
        context - Context.
        mac - valid Ble address(without colon).
        name - valid Ble name.
        mBaseCommCallback - communication callback.
        insCallback - Bp5s device callback.

    • Method Detail

      • getBattery

        public void getBattery()
        Get the Bp5S battery status
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get device's battery successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_BATTERY_BP5S
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP5S.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • getFunctionInfo

        public void getFunctionInfo()
        Synchronize the system time to BP device and get function of device
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If operation successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_FUNCTION_INFORMATION_BP5S
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP5S.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • getMeasureStatus

        public void getMeasureStatus()
        Query repeatedly measure status.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get repeatedly measure status successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_MEASURE_STATUS_BP5S
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP5S.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • getOfflineDataNum

        public void getOfflineDataNum()
        get offlineDate number.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get offlineDate number successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_HISTORICAL_NUM_BP5S
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP5S.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • setRepeatedlyMeasureParameter

        public void setRepeatedlyMeasureParameter(int schemeID,
                                          int timedMode,
                                          int repeatMode,
                                          int startHour,
                                          int startMinute,
                                          int measureTime,
                                          int measureIntervalMSB,
                                          int measureIntervalLSB)
        set repeatedly measure and start online measure.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If operation successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_SET_REPEATEDLY_MEASURE_SETTING_SUCCESS_BP5S
          • The keys of the message is null.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP5S.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

        Parameters:
        schemeID - scheme id
        timedMode - timed mode, if timeMode = 0, start measure immediately; if timeMode = 1, start timing.
        repeatMode - repeat mode, if repeatMode = 0, measure once; if repeatMode = 1, measure everyday.
        startHour - start hour,0-23
        startMinute - start minute, 0-59
        measureTime - measure time, 1-255
        measureIntervalMSB - measure interval (MSB)
        measureIntervalLSB - measure interval (LSB)

      • deleteRepeatedlyMeasureSetting

        public void deleteRepeatedlyMeasureSetting(int schemeID)
        delete repeatedly measure setting.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If operation successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_DELETE_REPEATEDLY_MEASURE_SETTING_SUCCESS_BP5S
          • The keys of the message is null.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP5S.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

        Parameters:
        schemeID - scheme id

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect the Bp5s.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If disconnect device successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceConnectionStateChange(String mac, String deviceType, int status, int errorID, Map manufactorData)
          • The status is iHealthDevicesManager.DEVICE_STATE_DISCONNECTED.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP5S.
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface DeviceControl

        public void init()
        Specified by:
        init in interface DeviceControl

        Specified by:
        destroy in interface DeviceControl

      • getUpDeviceControl

        public UpDeviceControl getUpDeviceControl()
        Get UpDeviceControl's implementation.
        We recommend not use this method, use iHealthDevicesUpgradeManager instead.
        Returns:
        UpDeviceControl's implementation
        See Also:
        iHealthDevicesUpgradeManager
